description: This file contains C source code implementing regular expression matching utilities, including functions for matching strings against a list of regex patterns, compiling regex patterns, and copying substrings based on regex match positions.

methods.name: int os_reg_list_match(os_reg_list_t * relist,char * str,regmatch_t * pmatch,size_t nmatch)
methods.description: Iterates through a list of regex patterns to find a match in a given string, compiling regexes if necessary and skipping invalid ones.

methods.name: void os_reg_match_cpy(char * dest,size_t destsz,const char * src,regmatch_t srm)
methods.description: Copies a substring from a source string to a destination buffer based on regex match positions, ensuring proper null termination.
